name: Intruder (Cascade Games)
overview: A game of the notorious "Cassette 50" collection. You have trespassed in a forbidden garden and the weeds are trying to trap and engulf you. Try to avoid being trapped by the multi-colored man eating weeds. keep going as long as you can. Once surrounded by weeds you will no longer be able to move. The longer it takes for them to engulf you, the higher your score.
